crown.name: CSK_Module_Dashboard
crown.desc: This is an automatically generated CROWN (description not necessary).

crown.name: CSK_Dashboard
crown.desc: Module to dynamically create a dashboard to show relevant values within its UI. + Check UI of this module for most available features. + {empty} + Typically this feature is configured via the CSK FlowConfig feature to link values to show in UI. +

event.name: OnNewStatusLoadParameterOnReboot
event.desc: Notify status if parameters should be loaded on app/device boot up.

event.name: OnPersistentDataModuleAvailable
event.desc: Notify status if features of CSK_PersistendData module are available.

event.name: OnDataLoadedOnReboot
event.desc: Event to call if module tried to load parameters and should be ready.

event.name: OnNewParameterName
event.desc: Notify name of persistent data parameter.

param.desc: Parameter name
param.name: name

event.name: OnUserLevelOperatorActive
event.desc: Status of Operator userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelMaintenanceActive
event.desc: Status of Maintenance userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelServiceActive
event.desc: Status of Service userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelAdminActive
event.desc: Status of Admin userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnNewStatusCSKStyle
event.desc: Notify UI style to use for CSK modules.

param.desc: UI style
param.name: theme

event.name: OnNewStatusModuleVersion
event.desc: Notify version of module.

event.name: OnNewStatusModuleIsActive
event.desc: Notify if module can be used on device.

event.name: OnNewStatusFlowConfigPriority
event.desc: Notify if FlowConfig should have priority for FlowConfig relevant configurations.

event.name: OnNewStatusEventToRegister
event.desc: Notify event to register to and to process data.

param.desc: Name of event
param.name: eventName

event.name: OnNewResult
event.desc: Notify new result...

event.name: OnNewData
event.desc: Notify current data values.

event.name: OnNewLabels
event.desc: Notify label names for data to show in UI dashboard.

event.name: OnNewDataNumbers
event.desc: Notify available number data.

event.name: OnNewDataTypes
event.desc: Notify types pf data to show.

param.desc: Data types.
param.name: dataType

event.name: OnNewDataStatus
event.desc: Notify boolean status of data.

event.name: OnNewStatusGaugeMinimums
event.desc: Notify minimum values for gauges.

event.name: OnNewStatusGaugeMaximums
event.desc: Notify maximum values of gauges.

event.name: OnNewGaugeUnit
event.desc: Notify unit of gauges.

event.name: OnNewStatusGaugeDigits
event.desc: Notify amount of digits to show within gauge.

param.desc: Amount of digits per gauge.
param.name: digits

event.name: OnNewStatusSourceEvents
event.desc: Notify source events of data to show in UI.

event.name: OnNewStatusSourceEventsDataPosition
event.desc: Notify parameter position within source events.

function.name: setParameterName
function.desc: Function to set the name of the parameters if saved/loaded via the CSK_PersistentData module.

param.desc: Name of the parameter.
param.name: name

function.name: setLoadOnReboot
function.desc: Configure if this module should load its saved parameters at app/device boot up.

function.name: pageCalled
function.desc: Function to register "OnResume" of the module UI (only as helper function).

return.desc: Empty string (only needed to simplify binding).
return.name: empty

function.name: sendParameters
function.desc: Send parameters to CSK_PersistentData module if possible to save them.

param.desc: [Optional] Set to TRUE if the data should NOT be saved immediately after sending.
param.name: noDataSave

function.name: loadParameters
function.desc: Load parameters for this module from the CSK_PersistentData module if possible and use them.

function.name: getStatusModuleActive
function.desc: Function to get status if module is active.

function.name: clearFlowConfigRelevantConfiguration
function.desc: Function to clear FlowConfig relevant configurations.

function.name: getParameters
function.desc: Function to get all parameters of the client in JSON format.

function.name: resetModule
function.desc: Function to reset main configuration of module.

function.name: setFlowConfigPriority
function.desc: Function to configure if FlowConfig should have priority for FlowConfig relevant configuration.

function.name: setLabel
function.desc: Function to set label for data to show in UI dashboard.

param.desc: Label to show in UI and related dataID (e.g. ['LabelA', '1']).
param.name: data

function.name: setEventToRegister
function.desc: Function to set event to receive data to show on dashboard.

param.desc: Data identifier to use.
param.name: dataID

param.desc: Event providing data to show in UI.
param.name: event

param.desc: Optional position of parameter within event (1 per default).
param.name: parameterPos

function.name: setDataType
function.desc: Funtion to set type of data to show in dashboard.

param.desc: Type of data and dataID (e.g. ['GAUGE', '1']).
param.name: dataType

function.name: setGaugeMinimum
function.desc: Function to set minimum of gauge.

function.name: setGaugeMaximum
function.desc: Function to set maximum of gauge.

function.name: setGaugeDigits
function.desc: Function to set amount of digits for gauges in UI.

param.desc: Amount of digits per gauge UI element.
param.name: value

function.name: setSourceEvent
function.desc: Function to set source event for data slot in UI.

param.desc: Source event of data and dataID (e.g. ['CSK_Moudle.OnNewData', '1']).
param.name: data

function.name: setSourceEventDataPosition
function.desc: Function to set data position for source events of specific data slot.

param.desc: Position of data within source event and related dataID (e.g. [1, 1]).
param.name: data

crown.name: Dashboard_FC
crown.desc: Crown to provide CSK_FlowConfig relevant features.

crown.name: UpdateValue
crown.desc: Set source to show and update value in dashboard.

function.name: create
function.desc: Internally used CSK_FlowConfig create function.

param.desc: Label of data to show on dashboard.
param.name: Label

param.desc: Data slot within dashboard to use.
param.name: DataID

param.desc: Optional position of parameter.
param.name: ParameterPos

return.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
return.name: handle

function.name: updateValue
function.desc: Set source to show and update value in dashboard.

param.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
param.name: handle

param.desc:
Source of data to show in dashboard.
Parameter: 1: Data (STRING)
param.name: source
